citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 on the 11th of
July 2023. Upon arrival at the facility, the licensee was contacted via phone and a voicemail was left when there was no
response. The licensee returned the inspectors call approximately 3 minutes later and stated that a responsible adult
would not be available to accompany the inspector for several hours. The licensee was informed that this would result in
an attempted inspection report being documented and the licensee would be contacted at a later date to discuss optimal
days and times.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 on the 11th of 
July 2023. Upon arrival at the facility, the licensee was contacted via phone and a voicemail was left when there was no 
response. The licensee returned the inspectors call approximately 3 minutes later and stated that a responsible adult 
would not be available to accompany the inspector for several hours. The licensee was informed that this would result in 
an attempted inspection report being documented and the licensee would be contacted at a later date to discuss optimal 
days and times. 
 
 
End Section
